scrapers package

scrapers.professor_scraper module

教授資訊爬蟲模組

class scrapers.professor_scraper.ProfessorScraper[source]

Bases: object

Professor Scraper class for scraping professor data.

__init__()[source]

Initializes the scraper with configuration settings.

async fetch_page_wrapper(url: str, params: dict = None) → None | str[source]

Asynchronously calls the fetch_page function to retrieve data.

Parameters:

  • url (str) – The target URL to scrape.

  • params (dict, optional) – Additional parameters for the request.

Returns:

The HTML content (str) if data is successfully retrieved.

If no data is available or if an error occurs, returns None.

Return type:

None | str

async scrape() → bool[source]

Executes the scraping process and saves the results.

This function fetches professor data, processes it, and stores the results into a JSON file and an SQLite database.

Returns:

Returns True if the scraping was successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

async fetch_professors_data() → list[dict][source]

Fetches data for all professors asynchronously.

This function creates asynchronous tasks to fetch multiple pages, then parses the HTML content to extract professor information.

Parameters:

None

Returns:

A list of dictionaries, where each dictionary contains

data for one professor.

Return type:

list[dict]

save_to_file(data: list[dict]) → None[source]

Saves the professor data to a JSON file and stores it in the SQLite database.

Parameters:

data (list[dict]) – A list of dictionaries containing professor information.

Returns:

This function does not return any value.

Return type:

None
